Flexbox

Flexbox allows for dynamically growing and positioning of rows and columns with flex and flexItem.

    MyFlexBox:{ x: 50, y: 50, w: 250, flex:{ direction: 'row', padding: 20, wrap: true }, rect: true,
        MyFlexItem: { w: 50, h: 100, flexItem:{ margin: 10 }, rect: true, color: 0xFF797979 },
        MyFlexBoxItemWithFlexItemChildren:{flex: {direction: 'column', padding: 20 }, flexItem: { margin: 10 }, rect: true,
            children: [
                { text: {text: "line 1"} },
                { text: {text: "line 2"} }
            ]
        }
    }

flex and flexItem properties:

NameTypeDefaultDescription
horizontalBooleantruehorizontal flex direction x or y
reverseBooleanfalseinverts row direction
wrapBooleanfalse
alignItemsString'stretch''flex-start', 'flex-end', 'center', 'space-between', 'space-around', 'space-evenly', 'stretch'
justifyContentString'flex-start''flex-start', 'flex-end', 'center', 'space-between', 'space-around', 'space-evenly', 'stretch'
alignContentString'flex-start''flex-start', 'flex-end', 'center', 'space-between', 'space-around', 'space-evenly', 'stretch'
paddingLeftInteger0
paddingTopInteger0
paddingRightInteger0
paddingBottomInteger0
paddingInteger0
marginInteger0
directionString'row', 'column'
alignSelfStringundefined'flex-start', 'flex-end', 'center', 'stretch'
growInteger01 = equal space distribution over its children, 2 = double the space over other containers
maxWidthInteger0max stretch width
maxHeightInteger0max stretch height

Flexbox in action

Below an visualization of how flexbox works when you change the width of the flex-wrapper.

class BasicUsageExample extends lng.Application {
    static _template() {
        return {
            Wrapper:{ x: 50, y: 50, w: 250,  flex:{ direction: 'row', padding: 20, wrap: true }, rect: true, color: 0xFF2D2D2D, paddingLeft: 200,
                Item1: { w: 50, h: 100, flexItem:{ margin: 10 }, rect: true, color: 0xFF797979 },
                Item2: { w: 50, h: 100, flexItem:{ margin: 10 }, rect: true, color: 0xFFA7A7A7 },
                Item3: { w: 50, h: 100, flexItem:{ margin: 10, alignSelf: 'stretch', grow: 1, maxWidth: 190, maxHeight: 100 }, rect: true, color: 0xFFD3D3D3 },
                Item4: { w: 90, h: 50, flexItem:{ margin: 10, alignSelf: 'stretch', grow: 1, maxWidth: 230, maxHeight: 100 }, rect: true, color: 0xFF74B4A7 },
               
                Sub: {flex: {direction: 'column', padding: 20}, flexItem: { margin: 10, alignSelf: 'stretch', grow: 1, maxWidth: 380 }, rect: true, color: 0xFF486f67,
                    children: [
                        { text: {text: "line 1"} },
                        { text: {text: "line 2"} },
                        { text: {text: "line 3"} },
                        { text: {text: "line 4"} }
                    ]
                }
            }
        }
     }
     _init(){
         this._myFlexAnimation = this.tag('Wrapper').animation({
             duration: 4, repeat: -1, stopMethod: 'immediate',
             actions: [{ p: 'w', v: { 0: 250, 0.5: 430, 1: 250 } }]
         });
         this._myFlexAnimation.start();
     }
}


const options = {stage: {w: window.innerWidth, h: window.innerHeight, clearColor: 0x00000000, canvas2d: false, useImageWorker: false}, debug: true};
const app = new BasicUsageExample(options);
document.body.appendChild(app.stage.getCanvas());
